card_text: If your opponent Special Summons a Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and/or Link Monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●Add 1 "Fallen of Albaz", or 1 monster that mentions it, from your Deck to your hand.$N●Special Summon 1 "Fallen of Albaz", or 1 monster that mentions it, from your hand.$NYou can only use each effect of "New Frontier" once per turn.
